nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 3 30 2 FC.Lyell 9 35 0 FC.Grady 4 44 0/skippable/showFrame FC.Lyell 57/viewport 10 37 clamp true/addConversationTopic FC.ElizabethSetting 7/addTemporaryActor FC.Objects 16 16 11 35 2 false Character/showFrame FC.Objects 66/advancedMove farmer false 0 5 1 1000 0 1 1 10 6 0 4 10/pause 1000/advancedMove FC.Grady false 0 -5 4 1000 2 0 2 10/emote FC.Grady 16/pause 500/showFrame FC.Lyell 58/pause 100/showFrame FC.Lyell 57/pause 100/showFrame FC.Lyell 58/pause 100/showFrame FC.Lyell 59/pause 500/speak FC.Lyell "Out until the sunsets huh?$1#$b#I'm the same way...$2"/pause 200/showFrame FC.Lyell 58/pause 300/playmusic {{ModID}}_Lullaby/speak FC.Lyell "Don't worry, I don't usually drink this much.$1#$b#It's just a special night tonight.$1"/pause 300/speak FC.Lyell "My wife had a birthday recently and we're finally celebrating.$1"/pause 300/showFrame FC.Lyell 0/pause 300/faceDirection FC.Lyell 0/pause 200/speak FC.Lyell "She's here in memory...Maybe even in spirit.$2#$b#I try to celebrate her birthday every year.$1#$b#But sometimes I'm late to the party.$2##$b#I'm sorry star shine.$2"/advancedMove FC.Grady false -2 0 4 10 0 -4 1 10 3 0 1 30000 -4 0 4 10 0 0 1 10/pause 3000/speak FC.Grady "I don't think she minds it...$2#$b#It's okay Lyell.$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection FC.Lyell 3/pause 300/emote FC.Lyell 12/pause 200/speak FC.Lyell "It's not, it's not okay Grady.$2"/pause 1000/quickQuestion #I think he just means it's okay to forget.#Yeah, you forgot, that's not okay. You have to remember her, right?(break)speak FC.Lyell "I know what he means...$5#$b#I just...It doesn't feel okay, forgetting about something so important...$2"\friendship FC.Lyell 3(break)speak FC.Lyell "I do, I need to remember her.$2#$b#She always hated being alone.$2"\friendship FC.Lyell -3/pause 300/speak FC.Grady "Come on buddy, I think you need some rest.$7#$b#You know how you get when you drink whiskey.$2"/pause 300/emote FC.Lyell 28/pause 200/speak FC.Lyell "I know...I'm sorry Grady, be right there.$2"/pause 200/faceDirection FC.Lyell 2/pause 200/speak FC.Lyell "I'll be seeing you friend, be happy and stay shapely.$2"/pause 400/move FC.Lyell -4 0 3 true/pause 200/viewport move 1 -1 6000000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
